name: Fish Mini Game: I want to be a shark! (Downloadable)
name_original: Fish Mini Game: I want to be a shark! (Downloadable)
description:
This fish wants to become a shark! Help the fish eat other fish so he can reach his goal.

Controls:

  • Space bar = go forward
  • Left arrow = go left
  • Right arrow = go right

Points:

  • Small orange fish = +1
  • Big pink fish = +5
  • Jellyfish = -3
